version_description: We are excited to release our latest app version! With this release, your daily worship routine has become even more personalizable! Our team is constantly working to improve Glorify and we really hope you enjoy our new app version. If there’s any way we can improve your experience, please let us know!

We are excited to release our latest app version! With this release, your music listening experience has become even more customisable, together with many other improvements! Our team is constantly working to improve Glorify and we really hope you enjoy our new app version. If there’s any way we can improve your experience, please let us know!

We are excited to release our latest app version! With this release, we are bringing small improvements to the app. Our team is constantly working to improve Glorify and we really hope you enjoy our new app version. If there’s any way we can improve your experience, please let us know!

We are excited to release our latest app version! This release addresses some bugfixes and general app improvements.
Our team is constantly working to improve Glorify and we really hope you enjoy our new app version. If there’s any way we can improve your experience, please let us know!

We're pleased to announce that this new version of Glorify allows you to access previous daily worship content. This version also comes with bug fixes.
Our team is constantly working to improve Glorify and we really hope you enjoy our new app version. If there’s any way we can improve your experience, please let us know!

Our team is excited to release our latest app version! Your daily worship experience just got better with additional tutorials on your Bible search, and the ability to save your Glorify account credentials in your keychain.

This new version also comes with even more intuitive categorisations on the Mind section and bug fixes to improve your overall experience.

Our team is constantly working to improve Glorify and we really hope you enjoy our new app version. If there’s any way we can improve your experience, please let us know!

We're always working on the app and ensuring it's the best it can be. This new release is complete with tweaks and improvements to enhance your overall experience.

Enjoy this new app version, and don't hesitate to contact us with suggestions on improving your experience!

We’re always mindful of making your Glorify experience the best it can be. Check out our latest app version for an improved Daily Worship experience, personalised content recommendations, progress tracking of the Listen tab content, and enhanced overall experience.

For more Glorify updates, follow us on Instagram and Facebook @glorifyappofficial
